about_the_game:
Overview:
Super Jump Guys is a charming and whimsical platformer game that takes inspiration from the joyful and playful spirit of "Only Up!" In this captivating adventure, players embark on an exciting journey through a whimsical world of vertically stacked levels. These levels are a delightful mishmash of quirky obstacles and gravity-defying jumps. The ultimate goal is to ascend to new heights while skillfully avoiding a myriad of hazards. Get ready for an epic adventure that challenges your skills, creativity, and reflexes in this delightful game.

Key Features:

Vertical Stacking: The game features vertically stacked levels, each with its own unique theme, challenges, and surprises. Ascend through a variety of imaginative environments, from enchanted forests to mechanical factories.

Gravity-Defying Jumps: Enjoy a gravity-defying experience as you leap from one level to another. Master the art of timing your jumps to navigate through intricate platforming sequences.

Quirky Obstacles: Encounter a wide range of whimsical obstacles that will test your agility and problem-solving skills. Dodge spinning saw blades, bounce on giant marshmallows, and swing from vines made of licorice.

Unique Controls: Innovative 3D platformer gameplay reminiscent of Mario 64
Fluid and responsive character controls that offer a unique gaming experience

Character Skins: Personalize your style with over 50+ skins, Show off your unique style as you progress through the game. It's important to note that character skins are items and do not affect gameplay mechanics.

Multiplayer Madness: Challenge your friends in local or online multiplayer mode. Compete to see who can reach the highest level or work together to conquer the game's toughest challenges.

Hidden Secrets: Explore each level thoroughly to uncover hidden secrets, bonus stages, and collectibles that add depth to the gameplay and enhance replayability.

Leaderboards and Achievements: Compete with players worldwide on leaderboards and strive to earn achievements that showcase your platforming prowess.

Super Jump Guys: offers a delightful and exhilarating gaming experience, filled with creativity, humor, and endless challenges. Whether you're playing solo or with friends, you'll find yourself immersed in a world where the only way is up, and the fun never stops. Get ready to leap into a whimsical adventure like no other!

name: Super Jump Guys

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD 2700X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 and above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD 5000 series or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 and above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: "Super Jump Guys": Whimsical platformer inspired by "Only Up!" Ascend through quirky, stacked levels, mastering gravity-defying jumps while dodging hazards. How fast can you reach the summit and claim your name on the SJG Leaderboard's
